CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​JSMenuData
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Menu
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​JSMenuData

A helper class to build the JavaScript menu data for Output.Builders.HTML.  See <JavaScript Menu Data> for the output format.

Usage

  • Fill in the menu data as described in the documentation for Menu.

  • Call Build().

  • Ta da.

Threading: Not Thread Safe

This class is only designed to be used by one thread at a time.  It has an internal state that is used during a call to Build(), and another Build() should not be started until it's completed.  Instead each thread should create its own object.

Functions
JSMenuData
public JSMenuData (
Builders.HTML htmlBuilder
)
Build
public StringTable<IDObjects.NumberSet> Build ()

Generates JSON files for all entries in the menu.  It returns a StringTable mapping the file type strings ("files", "classes", etc.) to a IDObjects.NumberSet representing all the files that were generated.  So "files.js", "files2.js", and "files3.js" would map to "files" -> {1-3}.

GenerateJSON
protected void GenerateJSON (
MenuEntries.Base.Container container
)

Generates JSON for all the entries in the passed container.

SegmentMenu
protected void SegmentMenu (
MenuEntries.Base.Container container,
string dataFileType,
ref StringTable<IDObjects.NumberSet> usedDataFiles
)

Segments the menu into smaller pieces and generates data file names.

BuildOutput
protected void BuildOutput (
MenuEntries.Base.Container container
)

Generates the output file for the container.  It must have ContainerExtraData.DataFileName set.  If it finds any sub-containers that also have that set, it will recursively generate files for them as well.

AppendMembers
protected void AppendMembers (
MenuEntries.Base.Container container,
StringBuilder output,
int indent,
Stack<MenuEntries.Base.Container> containersToBuild
)

A support function for BuildOutput().  Appends the output of the container's members to the string, recursively going through sub-containers as well.  This will not include the surrounding brackets, only the comma-separated member entries.  If it finds any sub-containers that start a new data file, it will add them to containersToBuild.

Properties
HTMLBuilder
public Builders.HTML HTMLBuilder {
get 
}

The Builders.HTML object associated with this menu.

Constants
IndentSpaces
protected const int IndentSpaces

The number of spaces to indent each level by when building the output without file shrinking.

SegmentLength
protected const int SegmentLength

The amount of data to try to fit in each JSON file before splitting it off into another one.  This will be artificially low in debug builds to better test the loading mechanism.

SegmentLength
protected const int SegmentLength

CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​JSMenuData.​ContainerExtraData
private
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​JSMenuData.​ContainerExtraData

A class used to store extra information needed by JSMenuData in each menu entry via the ExtraData property.

Functions
ContainerExtraData
public ContainerExtraData (
MenuEntries.Base.Container menuEntry
)
GenerateJSON
public void GenerateJSON (
Builders.HTML htmlBuilder,
JSMenuData menu
)
Properties
StartsNewDataFile
public bool StartsNewDataFile { get }

Whether this container starts a new data file.  This property is read-only.  If you need to change it, set DataFileName instead.

DataFileName
public string DataFileName { get; set }

If this container starts a new data file this will be its file name, such as "files2.js" or "classes.js".  It will not include a path.  If this container doesn't start a new data file, this will be null.

JSONBeforeMembers
public string JSONBeforeMembers { get }

After GenerateJSON() is called, this will be the JSON output of this entry up to the point where its members would appear.

JSONAfterMembers
public string JSONAfterMembers { get }

After GenerateJSON() is called, this will be the JSON output of this entry after the point where its members would appear.

JSONLengthOfMembers
public int JSONLengthOfMembers { get }

The calculated total JSON length of all members stored directly in this container.  It does NOT recurse into deeper containers.

HashPath
public string HashPath { get }

The hash path of the container, or null if none.  This will only be available after GenerateJSON() is called.

Variables
menuEntry
protected MenuEntries.Base.Container menuEntry

The menu entry associated with this object.

jsonBeforeMembers
protected string jsonBeforeMembers

The generated JSON for this entry, up to the point where its members would be inserted.

jsonAfterMembers
protected string jsonAfterMembers

The generated JSON for this entry, after the point where its members would be inserted.

jsonLengthOfMembers
protected int jsonLengthOfMembers

The calculated total JSON length of all members directly stored in this container, or -1 if it hasn't been calculated yet.  It does NOT recurse into deeper levels.

dataFileName
protected string dataFileName

If this container starts a new data file this will be its file name, such as "files2.js" or "classes.js".  It will not include a path.  If this container doesn't start a new data file, this will be null.

hashPath
protected string hashPath

The hash path of the container, or null if none.  This will only be available after GenerateJSON() is called.
